original_title: Absence is Present: Dead Nature in the Dark
overview: "As a result of open-heart surgery last year, I currently have a blind spot near the center of my vision. I had a 'mini-stroke' during surgery, and a small air bubble landed in my visual cortex, of all places. Normally I do not create work that is explicitly related to my personal life, but this new series is about perception more than anything else."
title: Absence is Present: Dead Nature in the Dark
